meanings.definition: A type of insect known for mating while flying in pairs.
meanings.sent1: The lovebugs danced gracefully in the air, showing their affection.
meanings.sent2: I saw a swarm of lovebugs flying together in the garden.
meanings.sent3: The lovebugs decided to have a mid-air wedding ceremony.
meanings.sent4: The sky was filled with lovebugs, creating a beautiful aerial ballet.
meanings.sent5: Children love to watch the lovebugs fluttering around in the sunlight.

meanings.definition: Affectionate nickname for a couple in a romantic relationship.
meanings.sent1: My grandparents are the cutest lovebugs; they hold hands everywhere.
meanings.sent2: The lovebugs shared a romantic dinner by candlelight.
meanings.sent3: The lovebugs giggled as they shared a giant ice cream sundae.
meanings.sent4: Their love was like a pair of lovebugs, inseparable and joyful.
meanings.sent5: The park was full of lovebugs enjoying a picnic under the trees.
